name: SchemeFlow
long_description:
- Getting housing and infrastructure built takes FAR TOO LONG in the developed world today. YEARS are taken up in approvals and technical work before work on site can begin. 
- SchemeFlow uses generative AI to draft the technical reports required for construction projects.
- Environmental impact assessments, traffic impact studies, acoustics, geotechnical, flood risk, heritage reports. The list goes on... Our technology lets technical professionals draft these reports in minutes rather than months.
- We HAVE to tackle this problem to restore prosperity and dynamism to our towns and cities. IT'S TIME TO BUILD AGAIN.
one_liner: Automating government approvals for construction projects
